summary: Iteration 26 - Testing AI Event Designer, Student ID Card, and Voice Assistant features. All features working correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features verified working: 1) AI Event Designer page at /app/event-designer - supports Pamphlet and Invitation Card designs with 6 event types (Annual Function, Sports Day, Graduation, Cultural Fest, Parent-Teacher Meet, Custom) and 5 design styles (Modern, Traditional Indian, Festive, Elegant, Playful). Print/PDF/Share buttons work. 2) Student ID Card - View ID Card option in student dropdown opens modal with student details, QR code, Download and Print buttons. 3) Voice Assistant (Tino) - Ask Tino modal works with text input and microphone, API responds correctly with navigation commands. 4) Login with director@demo.com / demo123 works correctly.

details: Design Type selection: Pamphlet and Invitation Card
Event Type selection: 6 templates (Annual Function, Sports Day, Graduation, Cultural Fest, Parent-Teacher Meet, Custom)
Design Style selection: 5 styles (Modern & Minimal, Traditional Indian, Festive & Colorful, Elegant & Premium, Playful & Fun)
Event Details form with all fields (name, date, time, venue, chief guest, description, contact, special note)
Generate AI Design button works - creates preview
Preview panel shows rendered design with Print, PDF, Share buttons
View ID Card option available in student action dropdown
ID Card modal opens with student details
Shows school name, student photo placeholder, name, ID, class, father's name
Ask Tino button in header opens modal
Modal shows Tino AI with Female Voice indicator

api_tests.POST /api/auth/login (director@demo.com): PASS - Returns access_token and user data
api_tests.POST /api/voice-assistant/chat (navigati: PASS - Returns navigate action with URL
